Husqvarna is constantly improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features.
In this release new functionality is added for the AWD mowers. From the new version of the app it will possible to update Firmware and configure new AWD mower features when mower is updated.
Release also includes bug fixes and improvements.

Husqvarna is constantly improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features.
In this release we have included Operating Manual for mowers. Operating Manual is found in new support tab in the menu. Release also includes bug fixes and improvements.

Husqvarna is constantly improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features.

This release includes support for the Husqvarna Automower® Limited Edition - a unique anniversary model celebrating our 25 years as leading robotic mower authority. Release also includes bug fixes and improvements.

This version includes support for app messages. Make sure you say yes to messages in your account settings to get the most out of Automower®. You'll get inspiring tips and great offers that allows you to keep the lawn in top condition, experience a smart garden and a wide range of dealer services.
Husqvarna is constantly improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features.

Automower® Connect has simplified your path to high quality accessories for Automower®. Direct access to the Husqvarna online shop is now available from the app in selected markets.

Husqvarna is constantly improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features.
Bug fixes.

Feel smarter with Automower® Connect! 

As one of the first services in the world, Automower® Connect introduces IFTTT-connections integrated to our app. Check out the “Smart home” tab in the menu to enable further smartness and automation of your lawn mowing experience.

Husqvarna is continuously improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features

As one of the first services in the world, Automower® Connect introduces IFTTT-connections integrated to our app. Check out the “Smart home” tab in the menu to enable further smartness and automation of your lawn mowing experience.

Husqvarna is constantly improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features. This update includes bug fixes and improvements.

The supporting part of Automower® Connect has taken a big leap forward by providing an easy to use interactive Help center available in the Support section of the app. The Help center will guide you when troubleshooting and solving common problems based on information from several sources, including the owners manuals, and it will learn and improve over time.

Husqvarna is continuously improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features. This update includes bug fixes and improvements.

Support for the new members of the X-Line series, Automower® 405X and Automower® 415X, delivering a premium lawn mowing experience in small and medium sized lawns.

Husqvarna is continuously improving the experience in Automower® Connect. Make sure to always download the latest version to be up to date with improvements and new features. This update includes bug fixes and improvements.
